comments.body:
this works if i want to read it. great. do you also know how to change the hash of the wrapper url?

thank you gitcenter
you can define mandatory files and optional files. but as far as i know you can not control if a file will be a big file or not. (it will just create a piece map for the file)

questions.title: interact with the [Wrapper] Hashchange # event
questions.body:
i want to use the hash http://127.0.0.1:43110/mysite/#hash for pagination on my site

how to get it?
how to act on the change event?
[Wrapper] Hashchange #hash
how to write it?
